about_the_game:
This DLC is a ASMR soundtrack that introduces the world of Radiant Victorias.
The story is about Cindy, a sister who experiences her first H with the protagonist.

【Story】

Cindy is giving a sermon in the town's church.
During the sermon, she approaches the protagonist and whispers something secretive into their ear,
asking them to return to the church after dark.
Later, when the protagonist enters the church, Cindy asks them to punish her for being a bad sister,
and they do so with a rope, tying her wrists to a pillar and penetrating her from behind...

The ASMR short drama series of this work has complete translations.
Please open the .mp4 video file at the local location.
There are SRT files available in Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, English, and Japanese.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: violent content, sex acts and sexual assault.
